questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Interior design and urban view
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a building with a view of a city
D) In a residential area

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) An urban view from inside a building
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A person
B) A chair
C) A building
D) A vehicle

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A chair
C) A painting
D) A table

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Ocean
C) Urban buildings and a parking lot
D) Forest

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A chair
B) A desk
C) A plant
D) A painting

What is the relationship between the chair and the window?
A) The chair is outside the window
B) The chair is in front of the window
C) The chair is behind the window
D) The chair is on top of the window

What can be seen through the window?
A) A beach
B) A forest
C) Urban buildings and a parking lot
D) A mountain range

What is the color of the chair?
A) Red
B) Black
C) gray
D) Yellow

What is the material of the chair's legs?
A) Metal
B) Plastic
C) Wood
D) Glass

How many vehicles are visible in the parking lot?
A) None
B) One
C) Two
D) Three

What is the texture of the floor where the chair is placed?
A) Carpeted
B) Tiled
C) Concrete
D) Wooden

What is the angle of the photo?
A) Aerial view
B) Eye-level view
C) Low angle
D) High angle

What element adds a modern touch to the interior?
A) The chair
B) The window
C) The wall
D) The floor

What is the condition of the parking lot outside?
A) Full of cars
B) One car parked
C) Under construction
D) Covered in snow

What is the function of the window in the photo?
A) To provide ventilation
B) To offer a view of the outside
C) To display artwork
D) To act as a mirror

What type of urban area is depicted outside the window?
A) Industrial
B) Commercial
C) Residential
D) Rural

What is the architectural style of the buildings outside the window?
A) Gothic
B) Modern
C) Baroque
D) Colonial

What is the lighting condition inside the room?
A) Dark
B) Bright
C) Dim
D) Colorful

What is the shape of the chair's backrest?
A) Square
B) Round
C) Wingback
D) Flat

What is the main material of the wall behind the chair?
A) Wood
B) Concrete
C) Brick
D) Glass

What is the visibility like outside the window?
A) Clear
B) Foggy
C) Rainy
D) Snowy

How is the chair positioned relative to the window?
A) Facing the window
B) Back to the window
C) Side to the window
D) On the window sill

What can be inferred about the location of the photo?
A) It is in a rural area
B) It is in a suburban area
C) It is in an urban area
D) It is in a remote area

What is the significance of the window in the photo?
A) It shows the interior design
B) It connects the interior with the urban exterior
C) It acts as a mirror
D) It is purely decorative

What is the condition of the chair?
A) Old and worn
B) New and modern
C) Antique
D) Broken

What is the likely purpose of the photo?
A) To showcase the view
B) To highlight the chair and showcase the view
C) To display the wall
D) To show the floor

What is the most prominent color in the photo?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Gray
D) Green

What is the state of the parking lot seen outside?
A) Crowded
B) One car parked
C) Partially filled
D) Under construction
